TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Samoa, title = Samoa, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samoa} }

S.FORM: Samoa hya' ga cyux maki' tay 13 35 S, 172 20 W na Tayangco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,831 sq km (maki' tay 178ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,821 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 10 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 198,926. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 12.40% , lhlahuy hya' ga 60.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 27.20%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Apia. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Tufuga Efi, aring ryax 11 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2007 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Samoa hya' ga cyox maki' tay 13 35 S, 172 20 W na Tayangco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,831 sq km (maki' tay 178ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,821 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 10 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 198,926. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 12.40% , lhlahoy hya' ga 60.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 27.20%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Apia. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mtzyo' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Tofoga Efi, aring ryax 11 sqo byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2007 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
